title: Baked Potato
steps: Scrub potatoes. Poke several times with fork.
Rub with oil and coat generously with salt.
Place directly on oven rack (sheet below to catch drips).
Bake until skin is crispy and interior fluffy, 50-60 minutes.
Cut X in top, squeeze sides to open.
Top with butter, sour cream, chives, bacon.
notes: No foil - steams instead of bakes.
